001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.net.URI;
007import java.util.*;
008import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
009import java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool;
010import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService;
011import java.util.function.Function;
012import java.util.function.Predicate;
013import java.util.function.Supplier;
014
015import javax.annotation.Nullable;
016
017import dev.failsafe.spi.Scheduler;
018
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.HttpExceptionFactory;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
021import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.*;
022
023import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
024import org.slf4j.event.Level;
025
026/**
027    <p>The ClientBuilder is used to configure and create an {@link ApiHttpClient}. As the ApiHttpClient uses a {@link HandlerStack stack}
028    of middlewares the Builder comes with methods to configure and attach new middlewares. Also it ensures that some default
029    used middlewares are instantiated at the correct location in the middleware stack.</p>
030
031    <p>The default middlewares and services are added as Supplier to be able to override the ones provided by e.g.: {@link #defaultClient(URI)}</p>
032 */
033public class ClientBuilder implements Builder<ApiHttpClient> {
034    public static final String COMMERCETOOLS = "commercetools";
035    static final String userAgent = "commercetools-sdk-java-v2/";
036
037    private URI apiBaseUrl;
038    private boolean useAuthCircuitBreaker;
039    private int authRetries;
040    private Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware;
041    private Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware;
042    private Supplier<RetryRequestMiddleware> retryMiddleware;
043    private Supplier<Middleware> correlationIdMiddleware;
044    private InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware;
045    private UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware;
046    private List<Middleware> middlewares = new ArrayList<>();
047    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stack;
048    private VrapHttpClient httpClient;
049    private VrapHttpClient oauthHttpClient;
050    private Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer;
051    private Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> httpExceptionFactory;
052
053    private Supplier<ExecutorService> oauthExecutorService = ForkJoinPool::new;
054    /**
055     * <p>Creates a default client builder</p>
056     * @return ClientBuilder instance
057     */
058    public static ClientBuilder of() {
059        return new ClientBuilder();
060    }
061
062    public static ClientBuilder of(ExecutorService httpClientExecutorService) {
063        return new ClientBuilder(httpClientExecutorService);
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link VrapHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
068     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
069     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
070     * @return ClientBuilder instance
071     */
072    public static ClientBuilder of(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
073        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
074    }
075
076    /**
077     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link ApiHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
078     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
079     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
080     * @return ClientBuilder instance
081     */
082    public static ClientBuilder of(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
083        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specifig {@link HandlerStack}</p>
088     * @param stack the HandlerStack to be used
089     * @return ClientBuilder instance
090     */
091    public static ClientBuilder of(final HandlerStack stack) {
092        return new ClientBuilder(stack);
093    }
094
095    private ClientBuilder(final HandlerStack stack) {
096        this.stack = () -> stack;
097        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
098        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
099        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
100        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
101        this.authRetries = 1;
102    }
103
104    private ClientBuilder() {
105        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(new ForkJoinPool()).get();
106        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
107        this.stack = stackSupplier();
108        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
109        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
110        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
111        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
112        this.authRetries = 1;
113    }
114
115    private ClientBuilder(ExecutorService httpClientExecutorService) {
116        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(httpClientExecutorService).get();
117        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
118        this.stack = stackSupplier();
119        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
120        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
121        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
122        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
123        this.authRetries = 1;
124    }
125
126    private ClientBuilder(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
127        this.httpClient = httpClient;
128        this.oauthHttpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(new ForkJoinPool()).get();
129        this.stack = stackSupplier();
130        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
131        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
132        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
133        this.authRetries = 1;
134    }
135
136    private ClientBuilder(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
137        this.httpClient = httpClient;
138        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
139        this.stack = stackSupplier();
140        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
141        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
142        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
143        this.authRetries = 1;
144    }
145
146    /**
147     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
148     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
149     */
150    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stackSupplier() {
151        return () -> {
152            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
153            Optional.ofNullable(errorMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
154            Optional.ofNullable(internalLoggerMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
155            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
156            Optional.ofNullable(oAuthMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
157            Optional.ofNullable(retryMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
158            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
159            middlewareStack.addAll(middlewares);
160            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(httpClient)), middlewareStack);
161        };
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
166     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
167     */
168    private Supplier<HandlerStack> oauthHandlerSupplier() {
169        return () -> {
170            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
171            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
172            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
173            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(oauthHttpClient)), middlewareStack);
174        };
175    }
176
177    public ClientBuilder withoutAuthCircuitBreaker() {
178        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
179        return this;
180    }
181
182    public ClientBuilder withAuthCircuitBreaker() {
183        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = true;
184        return this;
185    }
186
187    public ClientBuilder withAuthRetries(final int authRetries) {
188        this.authRetries = authRetries;
189        return this;
190    }
191
192    public ClientBuilder withHandlerStack(final HandlerStack stack) {
193        this.stack = () -> stack;
194        return this;
195    }
196
197    public ClientBuilder withHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
198        this.httpClient = httpClient;
199        return this;
200    }
201
202    public ClientBuilder withOAuthHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
203        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
204        return this;
205    }
206
207    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
208        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
209        return this;
210    }
211
212    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer) {
213        this.serializer = serializer;
214        return this;
215    }
216
217    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final HttpExceptionFactory factory) {
218        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory;
219        return this;
220    }
221
222    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Function<ResponseSerializer, HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
223        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory.apply(serializer.get());
224        return this;
225    }
226
227    /**
228     * configures the Factory for HTTP exception in case.
229     * @param factory
230     * @return
231     */
232    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
233        this.httpExceptionFactory = factory;
234        return this;
235    }
236
237    /**
238     * configures an ExecutorService to be used for the Middlewares
239     * @param executorService supplier of the executor service to be used
240     * @return
241     */
242    public ClientBuilder withOAuthExecutorService(final Supplier<ExecutorService> executorService) {
243        this.oauthExecutorService = executorService;
244        return this;
245    }
246
247    /**
248     * configures an ExecutorService to be used for the Middlewares
249     * @param executorService executor service to be used
250     * @return ClientBuilder instance
251     */
252    public ClientBuilder withOAuthExecutorService(final ExecutorService executorService) {
253        this.oauthExecutorService = () -> executorService;
254        return this;
255    }
256
257    /**
258     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
259     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
260     * <ul>
261     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
262     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
263     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
264     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
265     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
266     * </ul>
267     * </p>
268     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for the API
269     * @return ClientBuilder instance
270     */
271    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
272        return withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl).withErrorMiddleware()
273                .withSerializer(ResponseSerializer.of())
274                .withInternalLoggerFactory((request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic))
275                .withUserAgentSupplier(ClientBuilder::buildDefaultUserAgent)
276                .addAcceptGZipMiddleware();
277    }
278
279    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl) {
280        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
281    }
282
283    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl, final ClientCredentials credentials,
284            final String tokenEndpoint) {
285        return defaultClient(apiBaseUrl).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
286    }
287
288    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials,
289            final ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegionConfig) {
290        return defaultClient(serviceRegionConfig.getApiUrl()).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials,
291            serviceRegionConfig.getOAuthTokenUrl());
292    }
293
294    /**
295     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String)} instead
296     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
297     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
298     * @return client builder
299     */
300    @Deprecated
301    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
302        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
303    }
304
305    /**
306     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String, VrapHttpClient)} instead
307     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
308     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
309     * @param httpClient HTTP client to be used
310     * @return client builder
311     */
312    @Deprecated
313    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
314            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
315        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
316    }
317
318    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint) {
319        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString());
320    }
321
322    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
323            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
324        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClientSupplier);
325    }
326
327    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
328            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
329        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClient);
330    }
331
332    private TokenSupplier createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
333            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
334        return new ClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
335            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
336    }
337
338    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
339        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
340    }
341
342    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
343            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
344        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
345            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
346    }
347
348    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
349            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
350        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
351            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
352    }
353
354    public ClientBuilder withStaticTokenFlow(final AuthenticationToken token) {
355        return withTokenSupplier(new StaticTokenSupplier(token));
356    }
357
358    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
359        return withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
360    }
361
362    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
363            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
364        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
365            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
366    }
367
368    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
369            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
370        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
371            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
372    }
373
374    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
375            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
376        return new AnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
377            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
378    }
379
380    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
381            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage) {
382        return withAnonymousRefreshFlow(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint, refreshTokenEndpoint, storage,
383            oauthHandlerSupplier());
384    }
385
386    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
387            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
388        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
389            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClientSupplier.get()));
390    }
391
392    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
393            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
394        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
395            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClient));
396    }
397
398    private TokenSupplier createInMemoryTokenSupplier(TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
399        return Optional.ofNullable(oauthExecutorService)
400                .map(executorService -> new InMemoryTokenSupplier(executorService.get(), tokenSupplier))
401                .orElse(new InMemoryTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier));
402    }
403
404    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
405            final String anonTokenEndpoint, final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage,
406            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
407        final RefreshFlowTokenSupplier refreshFlowTokenSupplier = createRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials,
408            refreshTokenEndpoint, tokenStorage, httpClient);
409
410        final AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier anonymousFlowTokenSupplier = new AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier(
411            credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), credentials.getScopes(), anonTokenEndpoint,
412            refreshFlowTokenSupplier, httpClient);
413
414        return new TokenStorageSupplier(tokenStorage, anonymousFlowTokenSupplier);
415    }
416
417    private RefreshFlowTokenSupplier createRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
418            final String tokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
419        return new RefreshFlowTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), tokenEndpoint,
420            tokenStorage, httpClient);
421    }
422
423    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
424            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint) {
425        return withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
426    }
427
428    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
429            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
430        return withTokenSupplier(
431            () -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password,
432                tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
433    }
434
435    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
436            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
437        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
438            createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
439    }
440
441    private TokenSupplier createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
442            final String email, final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
443        return new GlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), email,
444            password, credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
445    }

447    public ClientBuilder addAcceptGZipMiddleware() {
448        return addMiddleware(AcceptGZipMiddleware.of());
449    }

452        this.errorMiddleware = errorMiddleware;
453        return this;

456    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware() {
457        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> ErrorMiddleware.of(httpExceptionFactory.get()));
458    }

460    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final ErrorMiddleware errorMiddleware) {
461        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> errorMiddleware);
462    }

464    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(ErrorMiddleware.ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
465        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> ErrorMiddleware.of(httpExceptionFactory.get(), exceptionMode));
466    }

469        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of());
470    }

473        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of(methods));
474    }

477        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of(requestPredicate));
478    }

481        return addMiddleware(exceptionMiddleware);
482    }

484    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Supplier<RetryRequestMiddleware> retryMiddleware) {
485        this.retryMiddleware = retryMiddleware;
486        return this;
487    }
488
489    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final RetryRequestMiddleware retryMiddleware) {
490        return withRetryMiddleware(() -> retryMiddleware);
491    }
492
493    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
494        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries));
495    }
496
497    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes) {
498        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, statusCodes));
499    }
500
501    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes,
502            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
503        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
504    }
505
506    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
507            List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures,
508            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
509        return withRetryMiddleware(
510            RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
511                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
512    }
513
514    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
515            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
516        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
517    }
518
519    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries) {
520        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries));
521    }
522
523    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
524            List<Integer> statusCodes) {
525        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes));
526    }
527
528    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
529            List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
530        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
531    }
532
533    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
534            final long delay, final long maxDelay, List<Integer> statusCodes,
535            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
536        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay,
537            RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
538                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
539    }

542            final long delay, final long maxDelay, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
543        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
544    }

553    }

561            final long delay, final long maxDelay, List<Integer> statusCodes,
562            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
563        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay,
564            RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
565                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
566    }

571    }

575    }

580    }

582    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes,
583            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
584        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
585    }
586
587    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, final long delay,
588            final long maxDelay, List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures,
589            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
590        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay,
591            RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
592                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
593    }
594
595    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, final long delay,
596            final long maxDelay, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
597        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
598    }
599
600    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware) {
601        this.oAuthMiddleware = oAuthMiddleware;
602        return this;
603    }
604
605    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final OAuthMiddleware oAuthMiddleware) {
606        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> oAuthMiddleware);
607    }
608
609    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final Supplier<TokenSupplier> tokenSupplier) {
610        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> {
611            final OAuthHandler oAuthHandler = new OAuthHandler(tokenSupplier.get());
612            return Optional.ofNullable(oauthExecutorService)
613                    .map(executorService -> OAuthMiddleware.of(executorService.get(), oAuthHandler, authRetries,
614                        useAuthCircuitBreaker))
615                    .orElse(OAuthMiddleware.of(oAuthHandler, authRetries, useAuthCircuitBreaker));
616        });
617    }
618
619    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
620        return withTokenSupplier(() -> tokenSupplier);
621    }
622
623    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerMiddleware(final InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware) {
624        this.internalLoggerMiddleware = internalLoggerMiddleware;
625        return this;
626    }
627
628    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory) {
629        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory));
630    }
631
632    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
633            final Level responseLogEvent, final Level deprecationLogEvent) {
634        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(
635            InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent, deprecationLogEvent));
636    }
637
638    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
639            final Level responseLogEvent, final Level deprecationLogEvent, final Level defaultExceptionLogEvent,
640            final Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, Level> exceptionLogEvents) {
641        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent,
642            deprecationLogEvent, defaultExceptionLogEvent, exceptionLogEvents));
643    }
644
645    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(String apiBaseUrl) {
646        return withApiBaseUrl(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
647    }
648
649    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
650        this.apiBaseUrl = apiBaseUrl;
651        return this;
652    }
653
654    public ClientBuilder withUserAgentSupplier(final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
655        return withUserAgentMiddleware(new UserAgentMiddleware(userAgentSupplier.get()));
656    }
657
658    private ClientBuilder withUserAgentMiddleware(final UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware) {
659        this.userAgentMiddleware = userAgentMiddleware;
660        return this;
661    }
662
663    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider,
664            final boolean replace) {
665        if (!replace && correlationIdMiddleware != null) {
666            return this;
667        }
668        if (correlationIdProvider != null) {
669            correlationIdMiddleware = () -> (request, next) -> {
670                if (request.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID) != null) {
671                    return next.apply(request);
672                }
673                return next.apply(
674                    request.withHeader(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID, correlationIdProvider.getCorrelationId()));
675            };
676        }
677        return this;
678    }
679
680    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
681        return addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider, true);
682    }
683
684    /**
685     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
686     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
687     * @return ClientBuilder instance
688     */
689    public ClientBuilder withMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
690        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(middlewares);
691        return this;
692    }
693
694    /**
695     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
696     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
697     * @return ClientBuilder instance
698     */
699    public ClientBuilder withMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
700        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(Collections.singletonList(middleware));
701        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
702            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
703        }
704        return this;
705    }
706
707    /**
708     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
709     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
710     * @return ClientBuilder instance
711     */
712    public ClientBuilder addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
713        this.middlewares.addAll(middlewares);
714        return this;
715    }
716
717    /**
718     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
719     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
720     * @return ClientBuilder instance
721     */
722    public ClientBuilder addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
723        this.middlewares.add(middleware);
724        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
725            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
726        }
727        return this;
728    }
729
730    public ApiHttpClient build() {
731        return ApiHttpClient.of(requireNonNull(apiBaseUrl), requireNonNull(stack.get()),
732            requireNonNull(serializer.get()));
733    }
734
735    public static String buildDefaultUserAgent() {
736        String runtimeVersion = SystemUtils.JAVA_RUNTIME_VERSION;
737        String osName = SystemUtils.OS_NAME;
738        String osArch = SystemUtils.OS_ARCH;
739        String sdkVersion = BuildInfo.VERSION;
740        return userAgent + sdkVersion + " " + " Java/" + runtimeVersion + " (" + osName + "; " + osArch + ")";
741    }
742}
